description.narrative: (Nigeria): -The Nigeria Capacity Building in Stored Commodity Program will provide the government of Nigeria and research institutions with specialized technical assistance to increase trade and agricultural production by reducing post-harvest losses of grains.-Major interventions will include conducting a workshop series on fumigation of large storage structures, capacity building in stored products research in the local institutions, research on effective aeration strategies for cooling stored grain, grain storage in warehouses, and introducing best practices to improve commodity storage and handling to reduce post-harvest losses.-The activity will help Nigeria adopt best silo and warehouse grain management practices to reduce post-harvest losses; apply procedures, systems, and standards for the production and importation of agricultural and food products; and build the capacity of government institutions grain storage management.
